subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: John Degenkolb won the 10th stage of the Vuelta a España but Joaquim Rodríguez of Spain kept the overall lead.
snippet: John Degenkolb won the 10th stage of the Vuelta a España but Joaquim Rodríguez of Spain kept the overall lead.
